translation.en: I hereby call this Thompson family meeting to order.
Now, if you all please turn to slide one, you'll see that a third car can actually save the family money over the long run.
translation.de: Folie eins zeigt, dass ein Drittwagen der Familie langfristig Geld spart.

translation.en: Mine's just GIFs of baby porcupines eating corn on the cob.
translation.de: Ich sehe nur GIFs von Babystachelschweinen.

translation.en: Because I already know your views on increasing our carbon footprint,
translation.de: Da ich deine Meinung zu unserer CO2-Bilanz kenne,

translation.en: so your presentation is just Best of Baby Animals.
Oh. Good thinking.
So, Mom, Dad, if you'll please turn to slide two,
translation.de: Mom, Dad. Seht euch Folie zwei an,

translation.en: you'll see that my learner's permit driving record is blemish-free.
translation.de: da steht, dass ich unfallfrei bin.

translation.en: Did you hire character witnesses again?
If that's your driver's ed teacher, he's not staying for dinner.
translation.de: Ist das dein Fahrlehrer? Er isst nicht mit.

translation.en: Where were you? I've been waiting at the train station all day.
translation.de: Wo wart ihr? Ich wartete den ganzen Tag am Bahnhof.

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Nick. Nicole?
Nicole Patterson? I'm here to live with you.
translation.de: Nicole Patterson. Ich wohne jetzt bei euch.

translation.en: Okay, what?
You didn't get the memo?
Was this an actual or metaphorical memo?
translation.de: Meint sie das wörtlich oder metaphorisch?

translation.en: They said they called and emailed.
-[Nick sobs] -Okay, sweetie. Just tell us what happened.
translation.de: Ok, Liebes. Sag, was passiert ist.

translation.en: What happened is...
my parents... died in a car accident six months ago,
translation.de: Meine Eltern starben vor sechs Monaten bei einem Unfall.

translation.en: and I've been in foster care until they could find some relatives,
translation.de: Ich war in Pflegefamilien, bis sie Verwandte finden,

translation.en: and then they said they found my dad's second cousin twice removed,
translation.de: dann sagten sie, sie fanden Dads entfernten Cousin,

translation.en: or something, and you were supposed to pick me up at the train station.
translation.de: und dass ihr mich am Bahnhof abholt.

translation.en: You don't know what I'm talking about. Now I'll have to go back to foster care!
translation.de: Ihr wisst nicht Bescheid. Ich muss wieder zurück!

translation.en: Hang on a second. Nobody's making you go anywhere.
We'll get to the bottom of this. You just never clarified if the memo was real.
translation.de: Wir klären das. Du hast nie gesagt, ob das Memo echt ist.

translation.en: Here's the letter from the state.
Here's a picture of my great-grandma with, I guess, your grandma, or something.
translation.de: Das ist ein Foto meiner Uroma mit deiner Oma oder so.

translation.en: Oh, Grandma Liza!
And they gave me this family tree. Oh God, this is a total nightmare!
translation.de: Man gab mir den Stammbaum. Was für ein Alptraum!

translation.en: Okay, let's take a deep breath.
Molly, why don't you take...
-Nick! -Nick...
to get something to eat while we sort this out.
Hi, I'm Molly. Do you like quinoa?
translation.de: Ich bin Molly. Magst du Quinoa?

translation.en: Or is this more of an ice cream situation?
translation.de: Oder willst du lieber ein Eis?

translation.en: Again, I'm so, so sorry about the mix-up, folks.
I have got egg on my face.
Oh, this is more than egg. This is a quiche.
translation.de: Mehr als nur Mist. Einen ganzen Stall.

translation.en: You quiched us.
Mistakes happen. Don't beat yourself up about it.
translation.de: Fehler passieren. Machen Sie sich nicht fertig.

translation.en: Bye-bye.
Can you believe that this social services coordinator was coordinating with another Ed Thompson?
translation.de: Unglaublich, dass die Sozialarbeiterin einen anderen Ed Thompson kontaktierte.

translation.en: I feel so generic!
-I wish I had a cool nickname. -Ooh, how about Laser?
-No. -Yes.
[sighs] All right, well...
this is, uh, quite a shock.
We were literally caught with our pants down.
That's literally not what literally means.
Irregardless...
we are problem solvers. We'll make this work.
translation.de: Wir sind Problemlöser. Wir kriegen das hin.

translation.en: So where's my room? Well, that's a problem. I have no idea.
Nick can stay with me in my room.
Seriously? I'm not even allowed in your room.
translation.de: Was? Nicht mal ich darf da rein.

translation.en: Come on, I'll show you where you can put your stuff
translation.de: Ich zeige dir, wo was hinkommt, und mein Snap und Insta.

translation.en: and how to follow me on Snap and Insta. Not Facebook.
translation.de: Ich zeige dir, wo was hinkommt, und mein Snap und Insta. Nicht Facebook. Da ist Mom.

translation.en: Mom joined.
So this is going to be our room. That sofa pulls out into a bed.
translation.de: Das wird unser Zimmer, das Sofa ist ausziehbar.

translation.en: But don't worry, it's more comfortable than it looks.
translation.de: Es ist bequemer, als es aussieht.

translation.en: You're being so nice to me.
translation.de: Du bist so nett zu mir.

translation.en: I really appreciate this.
Hey, I care about helping people.
It's kind of my thing.
My thing is watching old Rocky and Bullwinkle cartoons, but I like your thing, too.
translation.de: Mein Ding sind Rocky-und-Bullwinkle-Filme. Aber deins mag ich auch.

translation.en: You can put your stuff here, and the Wi-Fi is "ThompsonsRule!"
translation.de: Das ist deine Ecke. Das WLAN-Passwort ist "ThompsonsRule!",

translation.en: All one word, cap T, cap R, exclam.
translation.de: ein Wort, großes T, R, Ausrufezeichen.

translation.en: I know.
Hey, can I take a shower or something?
I haven't changed my clothes in, like, two days.
translation.de: Ich trage seit zwei Tagen dasselbe.

translation.en: Wow, that's super real.
The bathroom's in through there.
Thanks...
for everything.
I'm in.
I really like her.
Of course you like her. She's an orphan. Your friend Becky is going to be so jealous.
translation.de: Klar, sie ist eine Waise. Deine Freundin Becky wird neidisch sein.

translation.en: You must be tired of her hogging all the attention with her brother's tumor.
translation.de: Alle interessieren sich für ihren krebskranken Bruder.

translation.en: -I don't care what Becky thinks. -Hey.
Maybe you can dress Nick up like a hobo and take selfies down at the dump.
translation.de: Verkleide Nick doch als Penner und macht Selfies auf der Müllhalde.

translation.en: So, she's staying?
I'm just gonna say what your father and I are both thinking.
translation.de: Ich sage, was euer Vater und ich denken.

translation.en: Nick can't stay here.
Wait, what?
That's not what I was thinking. I was thinking the exact opposite.
translation.de: Ich habe genau das Gegenteil gedacht.

translation.en: Are you serious?
Because you're talking about raising another child, like, forever.
translation.de: Wir müssten noch ein Kind großziehen, für immer.

translation.en: Not forever. Just 'til she's been with us long enough to need therapy.
translation.de: Nur bis sie unseretwegen eine Therapie braucht.

translation.en: That sounds like a worthy goal, but I'm busy right now, with the cookbook and restaurant.
translation.de: Mag sein, aber ich habe mit dem Kochbuch und dem Restaurant zu tun.

translation.en: And the auditions for Top Chef coming up.
Believe me, no one can forget because you talk about it all the time.
translation.de: Das vergisst keiner, du redest ja ständig darüber.

translation.en: Guys.
Mom's got a point. I mean, she's just being realistic here.
translation.de: Mom hat recht. Sie ist realistisch.

translation.en: Exactly.
Look, I get that Nick's situation is sad.
translation.de: Nick ist in einer traurigen Lage.

translation.en: Super sad.
So sad.
But why does that have to make our situation sad?
translation.de: Aber wieso muss dadurch unsere Situation traurig werden?

translation.en: Because she's family.
She's such a distant relative, we could legally get married.
translation.de: So weit entfernte Verwandte darf man heiraten.

translation.en: So what, you just wanna kick her out?
No. No one's saying kick her out.
I'm just saying, why does she have to stay... here?
translation.de: Ich meine ja nur, wieso muss sie unbedingt hier wohnen?

translation.en: I'll tell you why she has to stay here. Because she's a child who needs us.
translation.de: Kann ich dir sagen. Sie ist ein Kind und braucht uns.

translation.en: Do I want another kid? No, I don't even want these two.
translation.de: Noch ein Kind? Nein. Ich wollte nicht mal die.

translation.en: Just a joke, guys. I love you so much, so much, but the point is...
translation.de: Nur ein Scherz, Kinder. Ich liebe euch sehr. Ich will sagen...

translation.en: that she's my second cousin, and she's already been removed twice.
translation.de: Wir sind verwandt, und sie ist bereits so weit entfernt.

translation.en: We can't do it to her a third time.
translation.de: Sie soll sich nicht weiter entfernen.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think that's what that means.
It doesn't matter. We can't kick her out on the street. That's not who we are.
translation.de: Egal, wir werfen sie nicht raus. Das tun wir nicht.

translation.en: Dad's right.
We have to do the right thing here. I vote she stays.
translation.de: Tun wir das Richtige. Ich sage, sie bleibt.

translation.en: This isn't a reality show. You don't get to vote her on or off the island.
translation.de: Das ist keine Reality-Show. Keiner wird gewählt.

translation.en: Everyone's opinion matters.
And thank you, Jeremy. I'm glad to see you coming around on this.
translation.de: Danke, Jeremy. Gut, dass du einlenkst.

translation.en: Yeah, you know, me too.
Because raising a child is expensive and we'll have to make sacrifices.
translation.de: Noch ein Kind ist teuer, wir müssen Opfer bringen.

translation.en: And first to go will be that new car you wanted.
translation.de: Es wird kein neues Auto geben.

translation.en: You know, and for the record, I was gonna say yes.
translation.de: Fürs Protokoll: Ich hätte Ja gesagt.

translation.en: Seriously?
I change my vote. I change my vote.
I vote for the car.
You can't change your vote.
[Liz] Wait. This is a tie,
-and the tie goes to the runner. -[Jeremy] What does that even mean?
translation.de: -Es fällt zu ihren Gunsten aus. -Was heißt das?

translation.en: So does she want Spanish or French?
You can give her Klingon for all I care. This is just temporary.
translation.de: Von mir aus Klingonisch. Es ist nur vorübergehend.

translation.en: So Spanish?
Looks like you're a big deal around here.
Yeah, I know.
Slow your roll. You're sophomore class rep, not King of the North.
translation.de: Sachte. Du bist Jahrgangssprecher, nicht König des Nordens.

translation.en: Nick, sweetie...
I know this is a difficult situation, and you could probably use some sort of inspirational speech right now.
translation.de: Das ist eine schwere Situation, du brauchst sicher eine Motivationsrede.

translation.en: So...
hold onto your dreams and...
reach for the stars... and seize the day.
translation.de: greif nach den Sternen und nutze den Tag.

translation.en: Bye.
So Jeremy's kind of full of himself.
Totally.
He even keeps a future resume on his phone
to remind him of all the things he needs to accomplish by the time he's 35.
translation.de: der ihn daran erinnert, was er bis 35 geschafft haben will.

translation.en: Spoiler alert, he becomes president.
Well, he doesn't seem to like me.
I guess he just doesn't want some sketchy foster kid living in his house.
translation.de: Er will wohl kein zwielichtiges Pflegekind zu Hause haben.

translation.en: Hey, just because you haven't been afforded the same opportunities we have, doesn't make you sketchy.
translation.de: Du hattest nicht dieselben Chancen wie wir, aber zwielichtig bist du nicht.

translation.en: Oh, my God, it means so much to hear you say that. I can really tell you care.
translation.de: Oh, mein Gott. Das bedeutet mir viel. Du sorgst dich um andere.

translation.en: That's my gift.
Well, I wish everyone saw it that way.
Think you could talk to Jeremy for me?
I totally would, honest,
but Jeremy only cares about Jeremy. Sorry.
translation.de: aber Jeremy kümmert sich nur um sich, tut mir leid.

translation.en: Big news, everyone.
This is Nick.
She's come to live with us because...
her parents died in a car crash.
So you're like... a for real orphan?
translation.de: Du bist also eine echte Waise?

translation.en: Uh... yeah, I guess so.
-Nick'll want to join our volunteer squad. -Your what?
We volunteer at soup kitchens, hospitals, old folks' homes.
translation.de: Wir helfen in Suppenküchen, Kliniken, Altenheimen.

translation.en: We're kind of Insta-famous.
Wow. You guys are super woke.
Totally.
Oh, wow, Molly. I just noticed.
translation.de: Molly, ich merke es erst jetzt.

translation.en: You're wearing a top from a major trans-national corporate retailer.
translation.de: Du trägst ein Shirt einer großen, globalen Firma.

translation.en: I am?
We're only shopping at Helping the Homeless Thrift Stores now.
translation.de: Wir kaufen nur im Laden, der an Obdachlose spendet.

translation.en: You know, #childlabor.
Actually, Helping the Homeless only donates nine percent of its profits to the homeless.
translation.de: Der Laden spendet aber nur neun Prozent der Einnahmen an Obdachlose.

translation.en: Its CEO lives in Aspen.
And true fact, supporting clothes manufacturers in developing nations
translation.de: Und Textilhersteller in Entwicklungsländern zu unterstützen,

translation.en: lifts millions out of poverty every year.
translation.de: hilft jährlich Millionen aus der Armut.

translation.en: [stammers] I knew that.
You know what? I'll talk to Jeremy and see what I can do.
Okay, people, let's take out your chloroform and prepare to anesthetize your frogs.
translation.de: So, Leute. Nehmt das Chloroform und betäubt eure Frösche.

translation.en: Stand with me to save the frogs!
What do we want? Animal rights!
When do we want it? Now!
Point of order, I move we table this and send it to committee.
translation.de: Ich beantrage die Vertagung, es soll ans Komitee.

translation.en: You're not supposed to be in here. Student council members only.
We're trying to pass a critical dance budget.
Spotify and five bucks worth of streamers...
Problem solved.
Now come talk in the hallway.
Don't underestimate the work we do on student council. It benefits the whole school.
translation.de: Unterschätze nicht unsere Arbeit. Es ist zum Wohle der Schule.

translation.en: Says the dictator who canceled our meals on wheels program.
translation.de: Sagt der Diktator, der Essen-auf-Rädern stoppte?

translation.en: Because the insurance was cost-prohibitive.
They could've all come to the ice cream social if you hadn't staged a protest.
translation.de: Sie hätten Eis essen kommen können, hättet ihr nicht protestiert.

translation.en: Because ice cream isn't fair to the lactose intolerant.
And, uh, speaking of intolerant, why are you being such a jerk to Nick?
translation.de: Apropos intolerant, wieso bist du so fies zu Nick?

translation.en: There's something weird about that girl.
You're just being judgmental.
Besides, Dad said everything was legit.
I'm not buying it. Girls don't just show up on your doorstep.
Well, not yours.
Admit it, all you care about is getting your stupid car.
translation.de: Gib's zu, dich kümmert bloß dein neues Auto,

translation.en: Which, by the way, is killing our planet, thank you very much.
translation.de: das unseren Planeten tötet, schönen Dank!

translation.en: And all you care about is your social media blowing up because your latest pet project happens to be a human.
translation.de: Dich interessiert nur Social-Media-Fame. Und dein neues Projekt ist ein Mensch.

translation.en: That's offensive.
I care about making the world a better place.
translation.de: Ich will die Welt zu einem besseren Ort machen.

translation.en: Becky's the one turning everything into a competition.
Look,
promise me you'll try and be nice to Nick.
translation.de: Versprich, nett zu Nick zu sein.

translation.en: The only thing I can promise you is I'm gonna find out what's really going on with her.
translation.de: Ich kann dir nur versprechen, dass ich rausfinde, wer sie wirklich ist.

translation.en: Where is your new best friend, anyway?
How did you like my performance yesterday?
Well, to be honest, Dorothy, it was a bit sloppy.
translation.de: Um ehrlich zu sein, Dorothy... Etwas nachlässig.

translation.en: What if they figured out that you and Sam are my real foster parents?
translation.de: Sie könnten merken, dass ihr die echten Pflegeeltern seid.

translation.en: Your pictures are online in the state database.
translation.de: Ihr seid in der Datenbank zu sehen.

translation.en: Well, obviously, they didn't look.
But you could've at least worn a disguise.
My disguise was a pantsuit.
It's true. She never wears those.
Listen... How's the plan going?
translation.de: Hör mal... Wie kommst du voran?

translation.en: Good. They don't suspect anything.
They better not, after all the money we spent on the documents. You know how much a fake court order costs?
translation.de: Besser so, die Papiere waren teuer genug. Weißt du, was Fälschungen kosten?

translation.en: Yeah. I can get one in an hour for 30 bucks.
translation.de: Ich kriege eine innerhalb einer Stunde für $30.

translation.en: Oh. That would've saved me $500!
It still seems like it's an awful lot of effort just to rob a random family.
translation.de: Es scheint viel Aufwand, um irgendeine Familie auszurauben.

translation.en: Really, it's too much effort for a $50,000 score?
translation.de: Echt? Zu viel Aufwand für einen Gewinn von $50.000?

translation.en: They have two high-end cars,
jewelry, watches, silverware.
And with me on the inside, there's no messy break-in, no alarms, no surprises.
translation.de: Mit mir vor Ort gibt's weder Einbrüche noch Alarme oder Überraschungen.

translation.en: Okay, so how do you plan to knock 'em out?
Don't worry. Leave it to me. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
translation.de: Überlasst das mir. Ich sage euch, wenn ich bereit bin.

translation.en: You're already ready.
In and out, easy-peasy. That's the plan.
translation.de: Rein, raus. Ganz einfach. So ist der Plan.

translation.en: I'm on the inside,
so I make the call.
And we clean them out when I say so.
translation.de: Wir rauben sie aus, wenn ich das sage.

translation.en: And can I borrow 20 bucks?
You would not believe what they charge for a latte at this school.
translation.de: Der Kaffee in der Schule ist echt teuer.

translation.en: Okay, listen up, people. We are doing the orecchiette with a pork fennel sausage.
translation.de: Hört mal. Heute gibt's Orecchiette mit Fenchelwurst.

translation.en: The special is a brown-sugar ricotta and egg raviolo.
Okay, we open in two hours, so get busy cooking or...
translation.de: Noch zwei Stunden, also fangt an zu kochen oder...

translation.en: [all] Get busy collecting unemployment.
translation.de: Fangt an, einen neuen Arbeitgeber zu suchen.

translation.en: Nick, what are you doing here?
Well, back at the foster home, all the kids had to pull their weight.
translation.de: In der Pflegefamilie mussten alle mitmachen.

translation.en: So I thought I could help out. I know my way around restaurants.
translation.de: Ich will helfen. Ich habe Restauranterfahrung.

translation.en: That is so thoughtful slash depressing.
But thanks, everything's under control here.
Does that look like fennel to you?
Sorry, I'm obviously too busy to babysit.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich habe zu viel zu tun.

translation.en: Is everyone here completely incompetent?
Cut that.
Wow, that's impressive.
Where did you learn to do that?
I was a cocktail waitress in Vegas for a couple years.
translation.de: Ich war einige Jahre in Vegas Kellnerin.

translation.en: Kidding.
I told you, I have some experience in restaurants.
Besides, I like working.
It makes me feel... useful.
Okay, I guess we could use some help around here.
But if the child labor people show up, you are 18.
How was your day?
What do you mean?
I don't know, isn't that like a standard question kids ask their dad?
translation.de: Fragen Kinder das nicht ihre Väter?

translation.en: Maybe in 1955, but not my kids.
Well, their loss.
Actually... to tell you the truth, I did have quite a day.
translation.de: Um die Wahrheit zu sagen, war mein Tag echt heftig.

translation.en: You see, I'm a senior loan officer at a bank, I have to decide who to give loans to.
translation.de: Ich bin Kreditberater bei der Bank, ich vergebe Kredite.

translation.en: That sounds really interesting.
It does?
Yeah, I mean, don't you get all sorts of fascinating people coming into your bank all the time?
translation.de: Kommen denn nicht ständig interessante Leute in deine Bank?

translation.en: Actually, yes, I do.
And they must have all kinds of stories to tell,
trying to buy a house or start a business.
If you think about it, you're kind of in the dream business...
translation.de: Genau genommen bist du im Traumgeschäft tätig.

translation.en: making people's dreams come true.
You really get me.
It's just, my dad got a loan to start a business once.
translation.de: Mein Dad nahm einen Geschäftskredit auf.

translation.en: He worked hard his whole life,
and I remember when I was, I don't know, maybe just like four or five...
translation.de: Ich weiß noch, als ich vier oder fünf war.

translation.en: he came home one night with a big cake
translation.de: Da kam er mit einer großen Torte heim,

translation.en: with white frosting and these little pink flowers on top.
translation.de: mit weißer Glasur und rosa Blüten drauf.

translation.en: You should have seen the look in his eye. I remember it like it was yesterday.
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich an seinen Blick, als wär's gestern gewesen.

translation.en: He was proud.
And so was I.
I have seen that look many times.
There's one lady who wants to open a yoga studio. -She-- -[cell phone beeps]
translation.de: Einmal wollte eine Frau ein Yogastudio eröffnen. Sie...

translation.en: Can you hold that thought?
I've gotta answer this message about my...
translation.de: Ich muss antworten, es geht um...

translation.en: math homework.
Don't worry about it. I'm terrible at math, and I work at a bank.
translation.de: Nur zu. Ich bin mies in Mathe und arbeite in einer Bank.

translation.en: That's what calculators are for.
Oh, good. You got my text.
translation.de: Gut. Du hast meine Nachricht bekommen.

translation.en: So, what's your real name?
Nicole Patterson is my real name.
Then, uh, who's Nicole Masipag?
That's also my name.
After my parents died...
I sometimes used my mom's last name.
I don't know why.
I guess I just wanted something to remember her by.
What gives you the right to go through my stuff?
Well, technically, it's Molly's room, so you have no real expectation of privacy here.
translation.de: Das ist Mollys Zimmer, du kannst keine Privatsphäre erwarten.

translation.en: Why do you hate me so much?
I don't hate you. I just don't trust you.
translation.de: Ich hasse dich nicht. Aber ich traue dir nicht.

translation.en: Hey, I get it.
You're obviously super-smart, in a serial killer kind of way.
translation.de: Du bist total klug, wie ein Serienkiller.

translation.en: Uh, thanks?
And you're a natural leader.
translation.de: Du bist von Natur aus ein Anführer.

translation.en: So you think it's your job to protect everyone.
translation.de: Du denkst, du musst alle beschützen.

translation.en: But you don't have to worry about me.
I'm not trying to cause a disturbance in the Force.
translation.de: Ich will keine Erschütterung der Macht.

translation.en: Sorry. I saw your Star Wars pajamas in the laundry.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Dein Star-Wars-Pyjama lag in der Wäsche.

translation.en: You're smooth. You're a lot smarter than you seem.
translation.de: Du bist gerissen. Klüger als du scheinst.

translation.en: Rude.
Look, I know this isn't just about me ruining that new car for you.
translation.de: Hier geht's nicht nur ums neue Auto.

translation.en: Maybe you're just afraid of sharing everything else you do have with someone you don't know.
translation.de: Vielleicht hast du Angst, deinen Besitz mit einer Fremden zu teilen.

translation.en: I don't know what you're up to, but I'm gonna find out.
translation.de: Was immer du planst, ich finde es raus.

translation.en: I'm not up to anything.
I'm just a girl who needs a family.
translation.de: Ich bin nur ein Mädchen, das eine Familie braucht.

translation.en: Are we good?
Oh, we're far from good... Nick.
Dorothy, it's me. I'm pulling the trigger.
translation.de: Dorothy, ich bin's. Legen wir los.

translation.en: Tell Sam tonight's the night I knock them out. I'll text you when they're unconscious.
translation.de: Sag Sam, heute knocke ich sie aus. Ich schreibe, wenn sie bewusstlos sind.

translation.en: I don't care if it's Armed Forces Week on Wheel of Fortune! Just record it!
translation.de: Mir egal, dass Army-Woche beim Glücksrad ist, nehmt es einfach auf.

translation.en: [Ed] So...
how was your day?
What do you mean?
That's exactly what I said when Nick asked me. Man.
translation.de: Das sagte ich auch, als Nick mich fragte. Mann.

translation.en: Is it possible that we are so self-absorbed we don't even recognize it
translation.de: Sind wir so egozentrisch, dass wir kein echtes Interesse bemerken?

translation.en: when someone takes an interest in our lives?
translation.de: dass wir kein echtes Interesse bemerken?

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you and your little ward had some time for a tête-à-tête,
translation.de: Toll, dass du und dein Schützling Zeit dafür habt,

translation.en: but I'm trying to get dinner ready. I could use help.
translation.de: aber ich koche und brauche Hilfe.

translation.en: Yeah, Nick's got me thinking. I mean...
translation.de: Nick brachte mich zum Nachdenken. Ich meine...

translation.en: sometimes I feel like we are strangers living in the same house.
translation.de: Mir scheint es, als wohnen wir als Fremde zusammen.

translation.en: I mean, shouldn't we care more about the little things?
translation.de: Sollten uns kleine Dinge nicht wichtiger sein?

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds great, but I don't know how to make that happen.
translation.de: Klingt gut, aber ich weiß nicht, wie.

translation.en: Neither do I, but maybe we can figure it out.
translation.de: Ich auch nicht, aber wir könnten es herausfinden.

translation.en: Remember, we're a team. You're the brain, I'm the heart.
translation.de: Wir sind ein Team. Du der Kopf, ich das Herz.

translation.en: Together, we make the Thompson body run like clockwork.
translation.de: Durch uns läuft die Familie rund.

translation.en: Yeah, but why do I always have to be the brain?
translation.de: Wieso muss ich immer der Kopf sein?

translation.en: What's wrong with the brain? Being the brain is a compliment.
translation.de: Wieso nicht? Das ist ein Kompliment.

translation.en: Well, sometimes I wanna be the heart. The heart is the fun job. Everyone loves the heart.
translation.de: Ich will auch mal das Herz sein. Das macht Spaß. Herzen mag jeder.

translation.en: Nobody likes the brain. The brain makes you do your homework and empty the dishwasher,
translation.de: Den Kopf mag keiner, denn er legt die Pflichten fest,

translation.en: while the heart gets to go out for ice cream and take in stray children.
translation.de: während das Herz Eis essen geht und Streunerkinder aufnimmt.

translation.en: I'll get it.
It'd better not be another stray child.
Thanks.
What's this?
It's called "pizza."
It's Italian for "food."
I know you're used to fending for yourself, but I made dinner.
translation.de: Du kennst das anders, aber ich habe gekocht.

translation.en: What's the special occasion?
Did someone die?
No, it's Nick's first real dinner with us.
translation.de: Es ist Nicks erstes Essen mit uns.

translation.en: You did this all for me?
-You don't eat together every night? -[Liz] Hell no.
But if you wanna to eat your pizza in your room, that's fine.
translation.de: Wenn du alleine Pizza essen willst, nur zu.

translation.en: I mean, I cooked my signature osso buco risotto, and I am a professional chef,
translation.de: Ich kochte zwar Osso Buco Risotto und bin Chefköchin,

translation.en: but if you just want gas-station-quality pizza--
No. I'm sorry.
It's just, I haven't had a family meal since...
Well, a long time.
Anyway...
this looks nice.
Thank you.
You know, that's not a bad idea. Maybe Mom could cook dinner for us every night.
translation.de: Das ist eine gute Idee. Mom könnte jeden Abend kochen.

translation.en: And then we could eat together, as a family.
Sure, no problem.
Or what if we took, like, a family cooking class?
translation.de: Was, wenn wir einen Kochkurs belegen?

translation.en: You could literally teach us how to cook and we could take turns making the dinners.
translation.de: Du zeigst uns buchstäblich, wie man kocht, und wir wechseln uns ab.

translation.en: That actually sounds kind of fun.
Cool. And Dad used "literally" the right way.
-So how was your first day of school? -Pretty good.
I stole the driver's ed. car, and got a whole three blocks before they brought me down with a spike strip.
translation.de: Ich klaute das Fahrschulauto, nach drei Blocks kam eine Nagelsperre.

translation.en: She's kidding. You're kidding, right?
translation.de: Sie macht Scherze. Stimmt doch, oder?

translation.en: It's so hard to tell what's real and what's made up with you, Nick.
translation.de: Schwer zu erkennen, was bei dir echt ist.

translation.en: Speaking of which, I heard Jeremy was hoping to get a new car when he gets his license.
translation.de: Jeremy hoffte doch nach dem Führerschein auf einen neuen Wagen.

translation.en: Until you showed up, and we had to make sacrifices.
translation.de: Bis du kamst und wir Opfer bringen müssen.

translation.en: Well, about that, I had a thought.
I'm working at Liz's restaurant after school now.
translation.de: Ich arbeite nach der Schule bei Liz.

translation.en: Wait, what?
Surprise. This girl can carry a freakish amount of cannelloni.
translation.de: Überraschung! Die Kleine kann massenhaft Canneloni tragen.

translation.en: We'll talk later.
So maybe you could get a job, too, and buy your own car.
translation.de: Vielleicht jobbst du auch und kaufst dir selbst ein Auto.

translation.en: Wait, like a "job" job, where I have to do stuff people don't wanna do?
translation.de: "Jobben"? Wo ich machen muss, was andere nicht tun wollen?

translation.en: This sounds like a pretty good solution.
It's really smart, Nick.
Thank you so much.
You deserve it.
This calls for a celebration.
translation.de: Das ist ein Grund zum Feiern.

translation.en: I saw some sparkling cider in the fridge. I hope that's okay.
translation.de: Ich habe Cider im Kühlschrank gesehen. Das ist doch ok?

translation.en: Sure, sounds nice.
Let me go get it.
[Liz] Nick, do you need any help?
No, I'm good.
Well, here's to my new family.
Wait! I want to say something.
I know you've only been here a little while, Nick,
translation.de: Du bist noch nicht lange hier,

translation.en: but I feel like you coming to us, this is happening for a reason.
translation.de: aber dass du es bist, geschah aus einem Grund.

translation.en: Oh, it's definitely happening for a reason.
translation.de: Es geschah definitiv aus einem Grund.

translation.en: No, I mean, maybe this is exactly what we all need, to shake things up,
translation.de: Vielleicht brauchen wir genau das, um uns wachzurütteln,

translation.en: make us realize how much we love each other.
translation.de: damit wir merken, wie lieb wir uns haben.

translation.en: I'll drink to that.
Wait. I want to say something, too.
translation.de: Halt. Ich will auch was sagen.

translation.en: I'll admit that I was unsure about you living with us, but I was wrong.
translation.de: Ich gebe zu, dass ich erst unsicher war, aber ich habe mich geirrt.

translation.en: You know, you kids could learn from this girl,
translation.de: Ihr könnt von der Kleinen lernen.

translation.en: 'cause she has faced hardship, and that has given her character.
translation.de: Sie hat Schlimmes erlebt, das hat ihr Charakter verliehen.

translation.en: Thank you.
Should we drink to that?
Wait. I want to say something, too.
translation.de: Halt. Ich will auch was sagen.

translation.en: I know you all know that helping people's my thing.
translation.de: Ihr wisst, ich helfe gern anderen.

translation.en: As long as everyone hears about it.
But I...
feel like Nick is the one helping me.
She's like the sister I never had.
translation.de: Sie ist die Schwester, die ich nie hatte.

translation.en: Wow. That's actually really sweet.
So... drink?
Wait. I want to say something, too.
translation.de: Halt. Ich will auch was sagen.

translation.en: I guess, I'll admit, I was also unsure about Nick.
translation.de: Ich gebe zu, dass ich auch unsicher war.

translation.en: Am unsure.
But at the same time, I don't know...
if I'm being honest with myself,
maybe I really am just afraid of sharing what I've got.
Because the truth is...
I do have a lot.
Now, let's drink to that.
Wait!
I'm sorry. It's just...
you guys don't realize how lucky you are to have each other.
translation.de: Ihr wisst gar nicht, wie viel Glück ihr habt, euch zu haben.

translation.en: I guess it's not until you lose your family that you realize that...
translation.de: Erst, wenn man keine Familie mehr hat, merkt man,

translation.en: family is everything.
And even if you don't always get along,
translation.de: Auch wenn man sich nicht immer versteht

translation.en: or you get on each other's nerves,
just knowing that your family is there...
translation.de: zu wissen, dass man Familie hat,

translation.en: somehow it just makes everything better.
Now let's drink before somebody else makes a speech.
translation.de: Anstoßen. Sonst kommt noch eine Rede.

translation.en: No, wait!
What the hell was that?
I just saw a Band-Aid... in the bottle of cider...
translation.de: Da war ein Pflaster auf dem Flaschenboden,

translation.en: A used Band-Aid.
I'm sorry. I'll clean this up. Just... stay right here.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Ich mache das sauber. Bleibt sitzen.

translation.en: [Sam] Well?
It's not the right time, Sam. What do you mean, it's not the right time?
translation.de: -Der Zeitpunkt ist falsch. -Was meinst du damit?

translation.en: We're down the street in a U-Haul.
I just jumped the gun on calling it.
But the truth is, we need to be patient here.
We can get a lot more than 50 grand if we play this right.
translation.de: Es winken mehr als 50.000, wenn wir's richtig anstellen.

translation.en: How much more?
How does a million sound?
Ed works at a bank.
I can get passwords, account information.
translation.de: Ich kann Passwörter und Kontodaten besorgen.

translation.en: And Liz owns a restaurant. There's cash just lying around.
translation.de: Liz gehört ein Restaurant. Dort liegt das Geld nur so herum.

translation.en: I saw it with my own eyes.
So let's not be stupid. This is a long con.
translation.de: Seien wir nicht dumm. Wir machen das im großen Stil.

translation.en: Why jump at the easy money when we can take the whole enchilada?
translation.de: Wieso das schnelle Geld, wenn wir die große Nummer haben können?

translation.en: You better be right.
Trust me.
[Nick] Who wants some gas-station-quality pizza?
Don't worry about Sam and Dorothy. I can put them off as long as I need to.
translation.de: Keine Sorge wegen Sam und Dorothy. Die lassen sich vertrösten.

translation.en: Trust me.
They have no idea this isn't a random family.
translation.de: Die wissen nicht, dass das nicht irgendeine Familie ist.

translation.en: Well, I'd better go.
I don't want them to get suspicious.
You stay safe, too.
I know, I know.
I love you, too, Dad.
